ecommerce.title:
Custom E-Commerce
Development Services
ecommerce.paragraph: CSSSR is ready to transform your design layouts into well performing websites to boost your sales. In the constantly growing and highly competitive e-commerce industry every page, every metric, and every customer opinion matters.
ecommerce.imgAlt: Illustration with two figures of people, a man conveys something to a girl

fintech.title:
Fintech and Banking
Web Development
fintech.paragraph: CSSSR group builds strong digital presence for banks and financial service providers. The financial industry nowadays rapidly expands into the digital world, more and more services are now available online to satisfy rising consumer demand. This transition causes growing demand for higher digital security standards. Find out how we can support.

informationTechnology.title:
Web Development Services
for IT Companies
informationTechnology.paragraph: CSSSR helps IT companies to become the market leaders. The IT industry is always on the cutting edge of technological progress. The efforts to adapt to new technologies as quickly as possible is not just a desire, but rather the key to success in this industry.

mediaAndMarketing.title:
Custom Development
for Media-Related Companies
mediaAndMarketing.paragraph: CSSSR assisted many media companies to grow and evolve, we maintain the highest standards of web development and apply the best practices to each project. Throughout history, entertainment was intertwined with culture, so it isn't surprising that the entertainment is massively presented on the web. Turn to us to find out how we can help you.

facts.heading: Development With a Personal Approach
facts.subHeading: Regardless of the size or duration of your project, we provide personalized services and flexible terms.

coreValues.heading: Core Values
coreValues.subHeading: We maintain the highest standards of web development and apply best practices to each project.

firstItem.title: Accessibility
firstItem.text: Did you know that up to 15% of all users have special needs when using the Internet? Each page and block should not only be well written, but should also be appropriately delivered, so that every user can enjoy it.

secondItem.title: Web Security
secondItem.text: Even a small vulnerability can lead to significant financial and reputational risks. From the beginning, we think carefully about code architecture and pay special attention to security issues.

thirdItem.title: UX
thirdItem.text: Perfectionism has to be smart. We always put ourselves in the place of the user and pay attention to the little things that can affect users’ opinions about the final product.

projects.heading: Cases
description: We work with a wide range of industries:
. We are proud of our client list and glad to share some of our cases.
